content:
FaultHandlerActivity Class

In this Article

Represents the activity class used to handle an Exception of the type specified by the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType* property. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.Designer(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FaultHandlerActivityDesigner), typeof(System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner))]
[System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem))]
[System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmap(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity), "Resources.Exception.png")]
[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator(typeof(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivityValidator))]
public sealed class FaultHandlerActivity : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IActivityEventListener<System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider

  • FaultHandlerActivity

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Constructors summary

FaultHandlerActivity()

Initializes a new instance of the FaultHandlerActivity class.
FaultHandlerActivity(String)

Initializes a new instance of the FaultHandlerActivity class using the name of the activity.

Fields summary

FaultTypeProperty

Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType* property.

Properties summary

Fault

Gets the Exception that is being handled by this FaultHandlerActivity.
FaultType

Gets and sets the Type of the exceptions to be handled by the FaultHandlerActivity. Exceptions of the type derived from the type specified in FaultType are also handled.

Provides a value that indicates whether this instance can filter on the specified Type.

Gets the filter description associated with this instance.

Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.

Returns the access type for the specified property.

Returns the Type of the specified property.

Constructors

  • FaultHandlerActivity()

    Initializes a new instance of the FaultHandlerActivity class.

    public FaultHandlerActivity ();

    Example

    The following example shows how to create an instance of the FaultHandlerActivity class. This example is from the Compensation SDK sample. For more information, seeCompensation Sample. 

    this.NoProductFaultHandler = new System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity();

    Me.NoProductFaultHandler = New System.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity()
  • FaultHandlerActivity(String)

    Initializes a new instance of the FaultHandlerActivity class using the name of the activity.

    public FaultHandlerActivity (string name);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The user-defined name of the activity.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      activityName is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Fields

  • FaultTypeProperty

    Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.FaultHandlerActivity.FaultType* property.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty FaultTypeProperty;

    Remarks

    This property is read only.

Properties

  • Fault

    Gets the Exception that is being handled by this FaultHandlerActivity.

    public Exception Fault { get; }

    Property Value

    • Exception

      The Exception associated with this instance. null is returned if the activity did not handle any exceptions.

  • FaultType

    Gets and sets the Type of the exceptions to be handled by the FaultHandlerActivity. Exceptions of the type derived from the type specified in FaultType are also handled.

    public Type FaultType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      The Type of the associated Exception.

    Remarks

    This property must be set to use the FaultHandlerActivity.

    Example

    The following example shows how to set the FaultType property. This example is from the Compensation SDK sample. For more information, seeCompensation Sample. 

    this.NoProductFault.FaultType = typeof(DiscontinuedProductException);

    Me.NoProductFault.FaultType = GetType(DiscontinuedProductException)

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • ITypeFilterProvider.CanFilterType(Type,Boolean)

    Provides a value that indicates whether this instance can filter on the specified Type.

    bool ITypeFilterProvider.CanFilterType (Type type, bool throwOnError);

    Parameters

    • type
      Type

      The specified Type.

    • throwOnError
      Boolean

      The value that determines whether an exception is raised on an error.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the Type can be filtered; false otherwise.

  • ITypeFilterProvider.FilterDescription

    Gets the filter description associated with this instance.

    string System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider.FilterDescription { get; }

    Returns

    • String

      The filter description associated with this instance.

  • IActivityEventListener<ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>.OnEvent(Object,ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs)

    Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.

    void IActivityEventListener<ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs>.OnEvent (object sender, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • sender
      Object

      The object that raised the event.

    • e
      ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs

      The previously typed event arguments.

  • IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetAccessType(IServiceProvider,String)

    Returns the access type for the specified property.

    System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetAccessType (IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • serviceProvider
      IServiceProvider

      An object that implements IServiceProvider to provide access to design time services if they are required.

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the property.

    Returns

    • AccessTypes

      An AccessTypes enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.

    Remarks

    Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another. Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.

  • IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetPropertyType(IServiceProvider,String)

    Returns the Type of the specified property.

    Type IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetPropertyType (IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • serviceProvider
      IServiceProvider

      An object that implements IServiceProvider to provide access to design time services if they are required.

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the property.

    Returns

    • Type

      The Type for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.

    Remarks

    Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one another.
